DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine response rate patient metastatic recurrent adenocarcinoma stomach gastroesophageal junction treat irinotecan , fluorouracil , leucovorin calcium . II . Determine qualitative quantitative toxicity , reversibility toxicity , regimen patient population . OUTLINE : Patients receive irinotecan IV 90 minute , leucovorin calcium IV 15 minute , fluorouracil IV weekly 4 week follow 2 week rest . Treatment continue every 6 week absence unacceptable toxicity disease progression . Patients follow 30 day , death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 18-37 patient accrue study .
